title: Kingyo No Fun (Sakurada Hina)
alternative_title: 金魚の糞 ; 金鱼之粪
status: 金魚の糞 ; 金鱼之粪
description:
Description :
        from Sound of Jewels:
Kingyo is the most lovely name in the world.
She was my stepsister. She had the most beautiful smile.
She was a crybaby. She was so kind that I couldn't bear it and
...I crossed the line.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1 : Can You Hear My Voice?
